titles.title: Pauline Epistles / Gǝbrä ḥawaryat "Acts of the Apostles" / Apostolic Epistles / Raʾǝyä Yoḥannǝs "Revelation of John"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Rome "Epistle of Paul to the Romans" [Rom.] (fols. 4ra-18vb) II) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos qädamawi ḫabä säbʾa Qorontos "First Epistle of Paul to the Corinthians" [1 Cor.] (fols. 18va-29rb) III) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos dagǝmawi ḫabä säbʾa Qorontos "Second Epistle of Paul to the Corinthians" [2 Cor.] (fols. 29ra-36ra) IV) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Gälatya "Epistle of Paul to the Galatians" [Gal.] (fols. 36ra-39vb) V) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa ʾEfeson "Epistle of Paul to the Ephesians" [Eph.] (fols. 39va-43rb) VI) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Filṗǝsyos "Epistle of Paul to the Philippians" [Phil.] (fols. 43ra-45vb) VII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Qwälasyǝs "Epistle of Paul to the Colossians" [Col.] (fols. 45va-47vb) VIII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos qädamawi ḫabä säbʾa Täsälonqe "First Epistle of Paul to the Thessalonians" [1 Thes.] (fols. 47vb-50rb) IX) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos dagǝmawi ḫabä säbʾa Täsälonqe "Second Epistle of Paul to the Thessalonians" [2 Thes.] (fols. 50ra-51rb) X) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos qädamawi ḫabä Ṭimotewos "First Epistle of Paul to Timothy" [1 Tim.] (fols. 51va-54rb) XI) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos dagǝmawi ḫabä Ṭimotewos "Second Epistle of Paul to Timothy" [2 Tim.] (fols. 54vb-56rb) XII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä Tito "Epistle of Paul to Titus" [Tit.] (fols. 56va-57vb) XIII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä Filmona "Epistle of Paul to Philemon" [Phlm.] (fols. 57vb-60vb) XIV) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa ʿǝbrawǝyan "Epistle of Paul to the Hebrews" [Heb.] (fols. 60va-68va) XV) Gǝbrä ḥawaryat "Acts of the Apostles" [Acts] (fols. 70ra-97va) XVI) Mälʾǝktä Ṗeṭros qädamawi "First Epistle of Peter" [1 Peter] (fols. 98ra-103ra) XVII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗeṭros dagǝmawi "Second Epistle of Peter" [2 Peter] (fols. 104ra-106vb) XVIII) Mälʾǝktä Yoḥannǝs qädamawi "First Epistle of John" [1 John] (fols. 107rb-111va) XIX) Mälʾǝktä Yoḥannǝs dagǝmawi "Second Epistle of John" [2 John] (fols. 112ra-112va) XX) Mälʾǝktä Yoḥannǝs śalǝsawi "Third Epistle of John" [3 John] (fols. 112vb-113rb) XXI) Mälʾǝktä Yaʿqob "Epistles of Jacob" [Jas.] (fols. 113vb-117va) XXII) Mälʾǝktä Yǝhuda "Epistle of Judah" [Jude] (fols. 117vb-118vb) XXIII) Raʾǝyä Yoḥannǝs "Revelation of John" [Rev.] (fols. 120ra-141rb)
Additiones 1-6.

donors.donor: Zä-Mänfäs Qәddus is mentioned in the supplication formula on fol. 139rb.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. has been rebound: the leather cover is recent, possibly also the boards. The leather cover is damaged at the spine and repaired with synthetic threads. Cuts and holes carefully amended on fols. 7, 51, 86, 110.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown leather cover. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, criss-cross, two types of x-form, double line fillet with dots).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes visible in the centre fold of the quires, one close to the head, one close to the tail. Traces (small holes) of endband stitches at the spine cover. Quires A, I and VIII are reinforced with parchment guards.

squires.squire: A(1; sl.: 1, stub before 1/fols. 1r-1v) – I(3; s.l.: 1, stub after 3/fols. 2r-4v) – II(10/fols. 5r-14v) – III(10/fols. 15r-24v) – IV(10/fols. 25r-34v) – V(10/fols. 35r-44v) – VI(10/fols. 45r-54v) – VII(9; s.l.: 7, stub after 2/fols. 55r-63v) – VIII(6/fols. 64r-69v) – IX(8/fols. 70r-77v) – X(10/fols. 78r-87v) – XI(10/fols. 88r-97v) – XII(8/fols. 98r-105v) – XIII(8/fols. 106r-113v) – XIV(6/fols. 114r-119v) – XV(8/fols. 120r-127v) – XVI(8/fols. 128r-135v) – XVII(6/fols. 136r-141v)

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Careful, by a well trained hand.

rubrications.rubrication: Incipit of all texts (red lines alternating with black lines); two initial lines of all sections; the word kǝfl "section" and section numbers; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals in Text XXIII (esp. fols. 126r); elements of Ethiopic numerals throughout the Ms.

otherdetails.otherdetail: - The scribe changed several times the proportions of the written area (in order to save space?).

additional.cont: Fols. 3ra-3vb: Excerpt from the Gospel of John (Jn. 3:1-21).

additional.det: Written in blue ink, in Amharic.
Written in Amharic in blue ink, in the same hand as Additio 3; "signed" with numerous finger prints.

additional.cont: Fols. 69ra-69rb: Excerpt from the Gospel of Matthew (Mt. 25: 1-13).
Fol 119ra-119vb: Excerpt from the Gospel of John (Jn. 5: 1-18).

extras.extra: - Crude note introducing the Acts of the Apostles: fol. 69va-vb. - Note introducing the Acts of the Apostles: fol. 69vb. - Crude copy of the incipit of the Second Epistle of Peter: fol. 103v. - Crude copy of the incipit of the Third Epistle of Peter: fol. 112va. - Note: fol. 141v. - Numerous corrections written over erasures: e.g., fols. 12ra, 12va, 20ra, 20vb, 54vb, 105ra, 108vb, 115rb, 130rb-130va; or written interlineally in the same or in a secondary (?) hand: e.g., 100vb, 101ra. - Commentaries written in the margin: fols. 137v, 138r. - A portion of the text washed out: fol. 111rb.

drawing.info: Fol. 141v: The Virgin Mary and Child, Archangels Michael and Gabriel.
drawing.details: Recent, crudely done, coloured (black and blue).
